DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Safety Study TL32711 Adults With Refractory Solid Tumors Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose Phase 1 open-label , non-randomized dose escalation study determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) characterize safety tolerability Birinapant ( TL32711 ) administer 30 minute intravenous infusion weekly three week per repeat 4 week interval subject refractory solid tumor lymphoma . Additionally study assess anti-tumor activity , pharmacokinetics , exploratory biomarkers measurement pharmacodynamic effect .
